entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Overloading by `nint` and `IntPtr` in `op_Implicit` #70953
  • IDE0055 triggered over collection expressions (but not array initializers) #70951
  • IDE0030 Failing to build a C# class library project. Unhandled Exception: System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null #70948
  • Can't emit source generated code files #70947

Closed

  • `await` completion in C# `void` method doesn't change `void` to `Task` when adding `async` #70866
  • Auto add async to method signature feature improvement #63081
    Backlog
  • IDE0028 False positive for new expressions as a class property #70952

PullRequests

Created

  • Decrease allocations in ObjectReaderTextReader.Create. #70950
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Emit constrained array access without runtime type check #70949
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Set stack trace on logged assertion failure exceptions #70954
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update to the latest dotnet/command-line-api version #70817
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Utilize IVsAsyncFileChangeEx2 #70936
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Generate async methods #70941
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid binding when computing explicitly implemented member names and metadata names #70783
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid binding when computing explicitly implemented member names #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement null conditional await #70916
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
